title: The Tiger's Offer
description: When Tina stumbled into that werewolf strip club, she never expected to walk out with the powers of a fertility goddess, but now that she has, well… she made a list.Step 1: Get a handle on her unruly new magic.Step 2: Convince the five shifter princes fighting over her that sharing is caring.Step 3: Experience sex the way only a fertility goddess canThere’s just one more thing.Step 4: Try not to die when bitchy priestesses come out of the woodwork to take her new magic for themselves.
author: Lila Jean
